title: Advanced Slope Failure Investigations
description: Experience the ultimate luxury living with breathtaking ocean views in this stunning beach house located in Malibu.
shortDescription: Luxury beach house with breathtaking ocean views in Malibu, California.

images.caption: Failure of the Highway Slope along I220s in Jackson, MS
3D LiDAR Point Cloud to Monitor Slope Movement
3D  ERI results of thee Failed Highway Slope

descriptionArray: Multiple Highway slope has been investigated using Advanced landslide investigation method using ERI, LiDAR and Drone Technology
The extent and depth of the failure was determined using LiDAR point cloud.
The moisture variations and release of pore water pressure was evaluated using 3D ERI profile.

title: Stabilization of Shallow Slope Failure
description: Escape to this cozy mountain retreat nestled in the heart of Aspen, Colorado. Enjoy skiing, hiking, and relaxation in this beautiful cabin.
shortDescription: Cozy mountain retreat in Aspen, Colorado.

images.caption: Condition of the Slope Before Repair
Condition of the Slope Before Repair
Design of the Slope Repair
ERI Testing for Site Investigation
Slope Repair using Recycled Plastic Pin

descriptionArray: A total of 450 RPP was used for stabilizing the slopes.
The installation of the RPP took 5 days.
The Project was completed in 2014. Over the last 10 years, no sign of slope movement was observed.

title: Strengthening of Slopes Using RPP to Reduce Wall Height
description: Escape to this cozy mountain retreat nestled in the heart of Aspen, Colorado. Enjoy skiing, hiking, and relaxation in this beautiful cabin.
shortDescription: Cozy mountain retreat in Aspen, Colorado.

images.caption: RPP Layout
Installation of RPP in 2:1 Slope

descriptionArray: RPP has been utilized to steepen slopes to save the cost of expensive retaining wall system. Slope inclination changed from 4H:1V to 2H: 1V.
Height of the retaining wall reduced from 12 ft. to 5 ft.
More than 2000 plastic pin was installed in 15 days.
Overall $500k cost savings was achieved.

title: Investigation of Seepage Location in Levee Section
description: Escape to this cozy mountain retreat nestled in the heart of Aspen, Colorado. Enjoy skiing, hiking, and relaxation in this beautiful cabin.
shortDescription: Cozy mountain retreat in Aspen, Colorado.

images.caption: Layout of the ERI lines at the Top of Levee Section
2D ERI Test Results

descriptionArray: ERI results are effectively utilized to determine the locations of the Seepage Locations within the levee sections.
Confirmatory Soil Drilling was performed based on ERI test results.

Installation of Bottom Layer of RPP

descriptionArray: Several Deep Seated Slope Failure has been repaired using Recycled Plastic Pin
Slope inclination changed from 3H:1V to 2H: 1V.
Double Layer Pin has been utilized for the Deep Seated Slope Repair.
The slope repair duration was 2 weeks.
A minimal soil dressing and repair work was

title: Strengthening of Slopes Using Recycled Plastic Pin
description: Escape to this cozy mountain retreat nestled in the heart of Aspen, Colorado. Enjoy skiing, hiking, and relaxation in this beautiful cabin.
shortDescription: Cozy mountain retreat in Aspen, Colorado.

images.caption: Layout of the RPP at top of Retaining Wall
Installation of RPP on Critical Slope using Light Weight Rig

descriptionArray: A slope on top of Gravity wall was repaired using RPP.
The soil on top of the wall was observed to be soft.
The slope was facing sloughing movement on top of retaining wall.
A lightweight rig was used to install the RPP on top of the Retaining Wall.
The entire slope was repaired in 4 days.
